abstract: San Antonio Spurs' owner Spurs Sports & Entertainment agrees to operate Major League Soccer franchise for 20 years starting in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Spurs Sports & Entertainment announced an agreement for a 20-year lease to operate a Major League Soccer franchise at Toyota Field starting in 2016.

headline.main: San Antonio Spurs’ Owner Lands M.L.S. Lease

snippet: Spurs Sports & Entertainment announced an agreement for a 20-year lease to operate a Major League Soccer franchise at Toyota Field starting in 2016.
